answers.body:
AFAIK, cloning is just a convenient function that does the required steps automatically:

1. create own new zite
2. copy to-be-cloned zite content into new zite
[According to the docs (clearnet)](https://zeronet.io/docs/site_development/content_json/#cloneable) a zite that may be clonable has to provide the default dirs and files that are to be cloned by suffixing `-default` to them.
